mapper.select: select p.likeuser, p.playlist_no playlistNo, p.playlist_date playlistDate, p.playlist_name playlistName, p.emo_no emoNo, p.makeuser userNo, p.nickname from (select up.user_no likeuser, up.playlist_no, p.playlist_date, p.playlist_name, p.emo_no, p.user_no makeuser, u.nickname from user_playlist up, playlist p, users u where up.playlist_no = p.playlist_no and p.user_no = u.user_no and up.user_no = #{userNo}) p where rownum <= 5

select p.likeuser, p.playlist_no playlistNo, p.playlist_name playlistName, p.emo_no emoNo, p.makeuser userNo, p.nickname from (select up.user_no likeuser, up.playlist_no, p.playlist_date, p.playlist_name, p.emo_no, p.user_no makeuser, u.nickname, cnt.likecnt from user_playlist up, playlist p, users u, (select playlist_no, count(playlist_no) likecnt from user_playlist group by playlist_no) cnt where up.playlist_no = p.playlist_no and p.user_no = u.user_no and p.playlist_no = cnt.playlist_no ORDER BY cnt.likecnt desc) p where rownum <= 5
